title: The Journey of Us
description: Vanessa MacElroy is grieving the loss of her husband. The problem is, Alec passed away two years ago and she is still in the depths of despair. Desperate to reinvigorate her life and be a somewhat happy role model for her young son, Freddy, Vanessa is open to any possibility.  Inspiration arrives in the trusted advice of her father. Vanessa and Freddy embark on a worldwide journey in search of their missing pieces. From a volunteering experience in India to a sumo wrestling match in Japan to a near death experience in Istanbul, Vanessa must trust her gut to keep them afloat.  Along the way, the bond between mother and son tightens while the bind that surrounds Vanessa's wounded heart loosens to the possibility of love, laughter, and happiness.
author: Rebecca Montemurro
